short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate YouTube subtitles, web pages, comments on social media, and copy emojis to the clipboard for use in your interactions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üàØ Most social media platforms offer translation tools that make it easier to interact with users from different languages on mobile devices. However, when accessing these platforms from a computer, translation options are often limited, which can make connecting with people from around the world more difficult. This is where Social Translator comes in, removing language barriers and enhancing your web experience!

With Social Translator, you can translate comments in bulk on platforms like YouTube, X, TikTok, Facebook, and other social media sites, allowing you to engage with users worldwide effortlessly. Additionally, the extension lets you translate entire web pages into multiple languages, making it easier to navigate and understand online content.

And that's not all! Social Translator also allows you to translate YouTube subtitles that are automatically generated and available only in English into other languages. This ensures you can fully enjoy and understand content, even when creators don't provide subtitles in multiple languages.

The extension also includes a convenient option to copy emojis to your clipboard, allowing you to personalize your comments and messages with creative expressions.

üåç Translate comments, subtitles, and entire web pages for a richer experience. üí¨ Add emojis to your comments to creatively express your ideas.

üì• Download Social Translator today and transform your experience on social media and the web!
